title: Law Enforcement Gangs, Movie Pass REALLY Gone 3.23.21
itunes:title: Law Enforcement Gangs, Movie Pass REALLY Gone 3.23.21
description:
In episode 842, Jack and Miles are joined by journalist Cerise Castle to discuss the LA Goth night club closing over sexual misconduct claims, new information from an Atlanta shooting victim's husband, the history of deputy gangs in the LA county sheriff's department, spring break in Miami, the new college admissions scandal documentary, MoviePass, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. L.A. Goth nightclub known for rituals and secrecy has closed amid sexual misconduct claims
  2. Shooting victim's husband says police detained him for hours
  3. A Tradition of Violence: The History of Deputy Gangs in the Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department
  4. South Beach curfew and causeway closures extended for the rest of spring break
  5. College admissions scandal gets shlock-doc treatment in Netflix's 'Operation Varsity Blues'
  6. MoviePass Teases Mysterious Relaunch, but It’s Unclear Who’s in Charge
  7. The Truth About the Zombie MoviePass Site Is That It's All Very Stupid
  8. 7 Things to Know About HMNY Stock as Investors Await MoviePass Countdown News
  9. WATCH: Barrington Levy - The vibes is right (1985)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
